mapper.insert: insert into localBussiness (productNo, title, writer, categori, content, address, menu, price,subCategory) values(null,#{title},#{writer},#{categori}, #{content}, #{address},#{menu},#{price},#{subCategory})
mapper.select: select * from localBussiness where productNo = #{productNo, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: UPDATE localBussiness SET revisitCount = revisitCount + 1 WHERE productNo = #{productNo, jdbcType=BIGINT}
